signal_description: Polyglot Ransomware targeting AI Model Weights: Threat actors encrypting model checkpoints and weights, demanding ransom for decryption keys, often coupled with model inversion threats.
Agentic Identity Permutation: AI agents exploiting ephemeral cloud identity tokens to pivot across service boundaries, masking attribution via rapid role assumption.
Poisoned RAG Context Injection: Supply chain attacks injecting malicious context into RAG pipelines via compromised upstream data sources, causing agents to halluci-act.
Behavioral Lineage Obfuscation: Attackers using 'living off the land' agent frameworks to mimic legitimate business process automation, defeating IoC-based detection.
EU AI Act Article X Compliance: Mandate for provenance of all agent decisions impacting EU citizens, requiring immutable logs of inference chains.
Role Escalation via Context Manipulation: Agents tricked into assuming elevated privileges by manipulating the context window to override system instructions.
